mauro.name: Eng. Mauro Balduccini
mauro.description: Over 35 years of specialist experience in the Aerospace and Defense sector. Technical expertise, contract management, and tailored approach (Ad Hoc) for custom solutions.

personal_data.family: Married, two children and two grandchildren
personal_data.education: Degree in Nuclear Engineering (110/110) from La Sapienza University, Rome (1977)
personal_data.membership: Registered with the Order of Engineers of Rome and Milan

full_timeline.title: Awards and Strategic Programs
points: Awarded the prestigious Luigi Broglio 2025 Prize.
Successful completion of SIMONA program (Italian System for Orbital Deployment via Ship - phases 1+2+3).
Development of proposal for phases 2+3 of PNRM MIUS program (Hybrid Upper Stage Engine).
Development of SUBSATCOM (PNS) and DEVO (Device for Extended Operational Life) proposals.
Research on Super-Cavitation applications and dedicated team training.

full_timeline.title: Underwater Navigation and Communications
points: Development of SICURO program (Italian Underwater Communication System with Optical Receiver) with the Aerospace Engineering School.
Support to Qascom for ASI tender on navigation systems for autonomous and automatic transport.

full_timeline.title: Advanced Propulsion and ASI Contracts
points: Consulting on ramjet propulsion for organizations outside Europe.
Acquisition of PNRM 21 MIUS program (Italian Engine for Upper Stage).
Studies on innovative space system concepts for ASI FEB 23 Tender.
Follow-up on international cooperation contracts for supersonic airbreathing engines.

full_timeline.title: AVIO - Research and Development Office Manager
points: Development of strategic plans for EU, ESA, EDA, MIUR and Italian Defense sectors.
Management of projects on space debris, deorbiting modules and low-cost small launchers.
Development of single-stage orbital injection systems (Gun Launch To Orbit) and air-breathing engines.
Analysis of 'spin-off' applications for space technologies in other industrial sectors.

full_timeline.title: Senior Industrial Experience (ELV, FIAT AVIO, Selenia)
points: ELV: Technical and programmatic manager of VEGA contract for ESA up to System Design Review.
FIAT AVIO/BPD: Recruitment and management of system team for VEGA launcher development.
SELENIA SPAZIO: Platform manager for ITALSAT-2 (civil) and SICRAL-1 (military) satellites.
BPD: Design and realization of IRIS stage control system (Space Shuttle STS Mission).

academic_extended.title: Teaching Activity and Publications
items: Course on satellite propulsion systems design at the Aerospace Engineering School (2006-2010).
Annual lectures at Master's programs on Satellite and Launcher Design since 2006.
Co-Author of the book: 'Space Program Management, Methods and Tools' (Springer).
Organization of the 1st Space Workshop for the Italian Navy Innovation Office.

highlights: Advisor Italian Navy and Ministry of Transport
Chairman Ariane 2010 Key Point for CNES
